page.title: 14A Visit To The Lake District
page.content: Lake District. The 4th years from Byley school went on an extended visit to Grange over Sands in the Lake District for 5 days in May. The house that we stayed in was called Kent's Bank House. We visited many places around Grange, including Silverdale, Cartmel Priory, Hawkshead and Brockhole. One evening Cedric Robinson visited us. He is the Queen's Guide to the Sands. He guides people over the dangerous quicksands of Morecambe Bay, and has written two books about his experiences. The house that we stayed in was very big and the food was very good. All the boys from Byley slept in one room. We went to bed at 9.00 PM.
